page.title: 09Events in Nailsea
page.content: The main{social events}in the Nailsea calendar are{The Nailsea Carnival Week with its procession of floats (decorated lorries) around the Town; the{Donkey Derby}with its donkey races and sideshows and stalls; the {Ponderama,}a series of races in crazy craft such as old bath-tubs and rafts made of oil-drums on the Lake near the railway station in aid of charities; the twice-yearly{Flower Show}and the annual{Fetes}organised by each school's Parent Teacher Association. The biggest of these recently has been that of our own School,{Grove Junior. This has taken the form of the popular "It's a Knockout!" games on B.B.C. T.V. It is a competition between teams of parents and teachers in crazy races on our School's field in June and known as{"The Nailsea Knockout!".
